  Gatsby Heat
</h1>

<p align='center'>

  <strong>
    Try a demo of this starter online at <a href="https://gatsby-heat.now.sh/">gatsby-heat.now.sh</a>.
  </strong>
</p>

## Usage

```bash
# with `gatsby-cli`
gatsby new <name> https://github.com/kiluhabe/gatsby-heat

# with `git clone`
git clone git@github.com:kiluhabe/gatsby-heat.git <name>
cd <name>
yarn install

# develop
yarn develop

# build
yarn build

# format
yarn lint:fix
```
